title: The Hobbit, or There and Back Again
gameTitle: The Hobbit, or There and Back Again
subtitle: Text-based RPG in Tolkien's World

rules.title: Game Rules

rule1.title: You are Bilbo Baggins
rule1.text: You play as the famous hobbit in Middle-earth, created by J.R.R. Tolkien

rule2.title: Describe actions
rule2.text: Enter commands in first person, as if you are Bilbo himself
rule2.example: For example: "I look around", "I talk to Gandalf"

rule3.title: Living world
rule3.text: The world reacts to your actions, and characters remember your deeds

rule4.title: Autosave
rule4.text: The game automatically saves your progress

rules.footer: Game based on the works of J.R.R. Tolkien

messages.languageChanged: Language changed! It's recommended to start a new game for full language application.
